column5: My son  wanted to ice fish this weekend ... yesterday was lets wait till tomorow .. got up this am and loaded the van ... got the hot chololate ready .. all the warm clothes .. warmed up the van ... got in the van and he looks at the temp ... -16 ... he decided right then it was too cold to walk out on the lake ... gonna have to wait for next weekend
I was gonna go ice fishing too today till I poked my head out the door. I guess I'll have to wait for next weekend as well.
Me too. Was just too cold today to fish without a shanty.

You will never be cold if you have good clothing, but you prolly save yerself some expenses as the fish are definitely not cooperating.  To test this get dressed in you heavy clothing tonight and go outside and see if you are cold.  I went out today and was not cold at all!! (see my report).
